item.title: ReactJS-and-Redux
item.description: Function Components Stateless Functional Components in React 0.14 – Josh Black – Medium Since react 14.0, you can now use the new stateless function component instead of the instead of ES6 class method to define a component // stateless functional components function Welcome(props) { return <h1>Hello, {props.name}</h1>; } // using class to define a component class Welcome extends React.Component { render() { return <h1>Hello, {this.props.name}</h1>; } } or even cleaner
